portfolio.title: Society Project
portfolio.description: This is an all purpose social network practice project, maintain by a group of highly motivated young developers. The client app is a NextJS TypeScript project, using MUI React components. The server application is a Java application with Spring Boot framework, Postgre database, app is dockerized.

portfolio.title: NFT marketplace
portfolio.description: Group project for NFT marketplace with option for listing nft's watermarked with brand logo. Users can buy and hold NFTs. Every user can list their NFT and every new NFT is 1% more costly than the previous.

portfolio.title: BookLibrary hardhat
portfolio.description: Book library project built with Solidity contracts & NextJS frontend. Covered with tests. Setup for testnet networks and deploy script.

testimonial.description: Small community that we administrate. Showing up goals and achieving them
